approveplanexecutionstep.name: ApprovePlanExecutionStep
approveplanexecutionstep.description: Grants permission to approve a plan execution step

cancelplanexecution.name: CancelPlanExecution
cancelplanexecution.description: Grants permission to cancel a plan execution

createplan.name: CreatePlan
createplan.description: Grants permission to create a plan

deleteplan.name: DeletePlan
deleteplan.description: Grants permission to delete a plan

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the RAM access control policy for a plan

getplan.name: GetPlan
getplan.description: Grants permission to get information about plans in all AWS Regions using a control plane

getplanevaluationstatus.name: GetPlanEvaluationStatus
getplanevaluationstatus.description: Grants permission to get a plan's evaluation status

getplanexecution.name: GetPlanExecution
getplanexecution.description: Grants permission to get plan execution details and setup information

getplaninregion.name: GetPlanInRegion
getplaninregion.description: Grants permission to get information about a plan in a specific AWS Region using the Region switch Regional data plane

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to get the resource policy of a plan

listplanexecutionevents.name: ListPlanExecutionEvents
listplanexecutionevents.description: Grants permission to list plan execution events

listplanexecutions.name: ListPlanExecutions
listplanexecutions.description: Grants permission to list plan executions

listplans.name: ListPlans
listplans.description: Grants permission to list plans in all AWS Regions using a control plane

listplansinregion.name: ListPlansInRegion
listplansinregion.description: Grants permission to list plans in a specific AWS Region using the Region switch Regional data plane

listroute53healthchecks.name: ListRoute53HealthChecks
listroute53healthchecks.description: Grants permission to list Route 53 health checks

listroute53healthchecksinregion.name: ListRoute53HealthChecksInRegion
listroute53healthchecksinregion.description: Grants permission to list Route 53 health checks in a specific AWS Region using the Region switch Regional data plane

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to define the RAM access control policy for a plan

startplanexecution.name: StartPlanExecution
startplanexecution.description: Grants permission to start a plan execution

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

updateplan.name: UpdatePlan
updateplan.description: Grants permission to update a plan

updateplanexecution.name: UpdatePlanExecution
updateplanexecution.description: Grants permission to update a plan execution

updateplanexecutionstep.name: UpdatePlanExecutionStep
updateplanexecutionstep.description: Grants permission to update a plan execution step
